title: Rice Paddy Methane Avoidance
subtitle: Wet rice agriculture generates 12% of global methane emissions, amounting to 1.5% of total GHG emissions. Lynx technology makes it possible to pass incentives directly to farmers, encouraging adoption of sustainable techniques and directly reducing methane.
